item.title: OpenAI’s Media Manager Puts Creators in the AI Driver’s Seat
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Following the launch of ChatGPT, OpenAI acknowledges the transformative potential of AI while recognizing the need for responsible data practices in this evolving field. To address these concerns, OpenAI recently published a blog outlining their data approach, introducing the new Media Manager tool for creators, and charting their vision for the future. item.content:encoded:

item.title: Google’s New Threat Intelligence Platform Revolutionizes Cybersecurity Landscape
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Staying ahead of threats is of utmost importance in the field of cybersecurity. However, with the complexity of modern attacks and the vastness of data to sift through, security teams often find themselves overwhelmed. Recognizing this challenge, Google Cloud has launched its latest innovation, Google Threat Intelligence. It is a state-of-the-art cybersecurity platform that promises […]
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Will Stack Overflow and OpenAI Partnership Shape the Future of Development?
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Stack Overflow and OpenAI announced a new API partnership. item.title: Microsoft’s MAI-1: A New Competitor to AI Language Models from Google and OpenAI
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: As the race for dominance in the AI landscape intensifies, Microsoft is stepping into the ring with its latest venture, MAI-1. This in-house AI model signals Microsoft’s determination to assert its presence alongside industry giants like Google and OpenAI. Boasting an impressive 500 billion parameters, this new model promises to take AI development a leap […]
item.content:encoded:

item.title: NVIDIA’s Visual Language Model VILA Enhances Multimodal AI Capabilities
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: The artificial intelligence (AI) landscape continues to evolve, demanding models capable of handling vast datasets and delivering precise insights. Fulfilling these needs, researchers at NVIDIA and MIT have recently introduced a Visual Language Model (VLM), VILA. This new AI model stands out for its exceptional ability to reason among multiple images. Moreover, it facilitates in-context […]
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Ola Krutrim Launches AI Cloud Platform and Mobile App

item.title: Get a Summary of Trending Topics on X with Grok-Powered Stories Feature
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: X, the social media platform formerly known as Twitter, has introduced a new feature called Stories, powered by Elon Musk’s AI chatbot, Grok. Available exclusively for X’s premium subscribers, Stories aims to revolutionize news consumption by providing concise summaries of trending topics within the platform’s Explore section. Let’s delve into how this innovative feature works […]
